channel.title: youtube on Gerben Jacobs
channel.description: Recent content in youtube on Gerben Jacobs

item.title: YouTube is my TV
item.description: When we bought our house in 2015 we got all the regular communication appliances; TVs and cable subscriptions, landlines, internet, etc. But we soon realized that we prefer to be on our computers more and as such the TV was left unused, most of the time. Recently I realized that I'm really using YouTube as if it was my cable TV. I could also clearly see the type of content that I'm watching, and it made me think that I've actually built my own TV channel.
